resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Enaex is a world leader in blasting services with our experts and technology located in North and South America,Australia,Asia and Africa
The Application does not collect and send any user information to Enaex.Information is only sent to intended recipients for the operating purposes of the application.

The information provided by this mobile application is for general informational purposes only. All information on this application is provided in good faith, however Enaex makes no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability, or completeness of any information or calculation made by this application. Conditions cannot be anticipated and all due care should be taken in the design and implementation of any and all blasts.

 Under no circumstance shall we have any liability to you for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of this application or reliance on any information provided by this application. Your use of the application and your reliance on any information is solely at your own risk.

 The application may contain (or you may be sent through our mobile application) links to other websites or content belonging to or originating from third parties or links to websites and features in banners or other advertising. Such external links are not investigated, monitored, or checked for accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability, or completeness by us.

 The Scaled Depth of Burial Calculations are made based on the work performed by Chiapetta et al (1997)
